entity.name: グレェ「grey」
entity.description:
オレはグレェでございます。I go by grey.
 More about me and some of the things I have contributed to can be found out about here: https://reviktra.neocities.org/fundingflossbio2025

projects.name: MacPorts
projects.description: Originally created as DarwinPorts, co-founded by luminaries such as jkh (Jordan Hubbard, one of the co-founders of the FreeBSD project), MacPorts is in essence to macOS/OS X what /usr/ports is to a BSD UNIX like operating system. Currently nearly 40,000 software packages are maintained by hundreds of contributors. Personally I tend to focus primarily on down streaming code from upstream OpenBSD related projects such as: OpenSSH, LibreSSL, signify, OpenSMTPD, etc..
licenses: various, MIT, ISC, BSD, GPL, etc.

channels.description: Will accept ACH to my Credit Union. Please e-mail me for details.
Pay with your debit/credit card through this libre/free open source payment gateway and setup recurring subscriptions.
Pay with your debit/credit card through this closed source proprietary PayPal payment gateway.
